document_data.name: Tornar
document_data.mainbody: '''Tornar''' the Eye was a criminal from [[Scornubel]] during the mid-14{{th}} century [[DR]].{{cite book/Hand of Fire/TPB 2002|308|18}}
document_data.Personality: He was always on edge, instinctively reaching for his weapons even while speaking to his master.
document_data.Possessions: Tornar carried a crossbow, at least, and poison, almost certainly [[bloodbite]] by [[Sharantyr]]'s appreciation.
document_data.Activities: He was a spy for Belgon Bradaskor, the Master of Shadows of Scornubel; in fact he was many of the man's "eyes". He also served as an assassin to boot.
document_data.Relationships: According to the Zhentarim, he was [[Belgon Bradaskor]]'s most trusted spy.
